schema_notes: Enhanced with production_health and audit tracking - Version 2.0
requirement_description: Fix dual avatar system architecture before Phase 6

blockers.description: AvatarManager defaults to pm_classic.glb, GPUStreaming uses Ty.glb, but deployed asset is humano_professional.glb
blockers.impact: Avatar may not render correctly - model paths don't match deployed assets

resolved_blockers.description: AvatarManager initialization fails due to incorrect TTS path - shows error overlay instead of graceful fallback
resolved_blockers.resolution: Fixed TTS path in AvatarManager.js (now uses window.CONFIG?.API_BASE_URL + /api/v1/tts). Also fixed tts.js and virtual-human-api.js. Graceful fallback already implemented.

resolved_blockers.description: Two competing avatar systems (AvatarManager vs GPUStreaming) both try to render to same container
resolved_blockers.resolution: Systems are now properly unified: AvatarManager handles TTS/audio only (canvasId: null, enabled: false in classroom), GPUStreaming handles all WebGL rendering. Graceful fallback chain: Premium → Standard → Free → Static with toast notifications instead of error overlays.

resolved_blockers.description: TTS API endpoint appeared to return 404
resolved_blockers.resolution: TTS endpoint /api/v1/tts is WORKING - returns valid WAV audio. The 404 was from incorrect path /tts in AvatarManager.js

resolved_blockers.description: env.AI binding undefined - AI chat returns empty responses
resolved_blockers.resolution: AI binding now working - verified via /api/v1/ai/chat endpoint

resolved_blockers.description: Enrollment on courses.html redirected to sign-up even when logged in
resolved_blockers.resolution: Fixed auth check to use window.AUTH?.getCurrentUser() and correct API endpoint

resolved_blockers.description: Enter Classroom links had no courseId, causing errors
resolved_blockers.resolution: Changed all Enter Classroom links to redirect to My Courses section for course selection

notes.current_focus: Stabilize and document architecture before fixing avatar system
notes.session_43_milestone: Comprehensive audit - identified model path mismatch across avatar systems
notes.session_41_milestone: Fixed TTS paths, unified avatar systems, DEPLOYED 15 avatar texture files, lip sync integration
notes.session_40_milestone: Production Audit - TTS confirmed working, handoffs archived

recent_changes.change: Comprehensive Platform Audit - Model Mismatch Identified
recent_changes.impact: Full audit with 100% verified facts. Found: AvatarManager defaults to pm_classic.glb, GPUStreaming uses Ty.glb, but deployed asset is humano_professional.glb. Database: 82 tables. API: 40 endpoints (v2.2.0). TTS: Working (104KB audio). Old audits archived.
Avatar temporarily disabled for debugging. Root cause: two avatar systems competing.

Fixed TTS paths, deployed 15 avatar texture files to production (commit 617066a), implemented lip sync integration, floating widget. All texture 404 errors resolved. Avatar should now render with full PBR materials.
Verified all 40 API endpoints working. TTS confirmed functional (was misreported as 404). Archived 7 old handoffs. Updated all governance documents.

Created src/routes/exams.ts (6 endpoints) and src/routes/gpu.ts (7 endpoints). Verified exam_sessions, proctoring_violations, gpu_sessions tables in database (82 total tables). All endpoints deployed and tested.

Enhanced proctor-controller.js (1200 lines), created vision-ai.js (680 lines) with TensorFlow.js face detection, created gpu-streaming.js (850 lines) with tiered avatar rendering. Updated classroom.html with module integration.

recent_changes.change: Phase 5 Virtual Classroom COMPLETE + Bug Fixes
recent_changes.impact: P5.1-P5.8 implemented: classroom-session.js API client, classroom.html with API integration, backend classroom routes (sessions, interactions, lessons), student controls (prev/next, pause, bookmark), raise hand, session stats.
